openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  title: Translator
  version: 0.1.0
  contact:
    name: SpecializedGeneralist
    url: https://github.com/SpecializedGeneralist
    email: specializedgeneralist@protonmail.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

paths:
  /translate_text:
    post:
      description: Translate a text
      operationId: translateText
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TranslateTextInput'
      responses:
        default:
          description: Translated text
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TranslateTextResponse'

components:
  schemas:
    ResponseErrors:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseError'
    ResponseError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
      additionalProperties: false
    TranslateTextInput:
      type: object
      properties:
        source_language:
          type: string
          description: Language identifier of the input text
        target_language:
          type: string
          description: Identifier of the translation target language
        text:
          type: string
      additionalProperties: false
    TranslateTextResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TranslateTextData'
        errors:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseErrors'
      additionalProperties: false
    TranslateTextData:
      type: object
      properties:
        took:
          type: number
          description: How much time the translation process took in seconds
        translated_text:
          type: string
          description: Text translated into the target language
      additionalProperties: false
